experiences.title: Cloud and Software Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Landmark, Halliburton, Houston TX
workDescription: Designed and implemented an app for 5000+ clients to access and transfer large amounts of data between cloud services and their local drive on the iEnergy infrastructure team.
Gained familiarity with SoftNAS, Azure, AWS SDKs along with JavaFX and Java for full stack development; gained experience with IaC tools including Terraform and Ansible.
Presented and demoed my application as a solution to a board of managers across departments.

experiences.title: IT and Development Intern
experiences.subtitle: AssuredPartners, Cranford NJ
workDescription: Worked on designing an automation solution to cut down time spent on filling in renewal sheets by 90%.
Assisted in migration from old angular to new angular, attended daily scrum calls, unit and smoke tested, deployed code.
Generated, pitched, and demoed a company improving idea to executives and over 200 employees with a team of interns.
Top 8 of 25 team to make it to the final round. Enforced teamworking, and leadership skills.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Stoneview Technologies, Greenwich CT
workDescription: Worked on development of program to pull, validate, and further analyze and quantify stock data for daily and repetitive use.
Wrote Python ETL loaders to load stock and dividend data from Quandl, used SQL queries to validate and analyze data.
Exposure to financial technology. Enforced communication and conflict resolution skills.

experiences.title: Technical Mentee
experiences.subtitle: Microsoft, Virtual
workDescription: Applied and accepted to a program to cultivate technical resilience.
Participated in weekly and individual meetings forging connections with Microsoft mentors and other students. Worked on personal growth to aid technical endeavors.
Worked on developing a growth mindset.
